body_html: So, actually, at the moment, if you do a build in the root folder (mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. && make), this will build Caffe2, just like it did in the old repo. So just keep on doing what you had been doing before.
body_text: So, actually, at the moment, if you do a build in the root folder (mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. && make), this will build Caffe2, just like it did in the old repo. So just keep on doing what you had been doing before.
body: So, actually, at the moment, if you do a build in the root folder (mkdir build && cd build && cmake .. && make), this will build Caffe2, just like it did in the old repo. So just keep on doing what you had been doing before.
